tutorial.title: Syntax
tutorial.content:
new DataTree(element)
new DataTree(element,data)
new DataTree(element,data,warning)

data = { name: 'name', d[ { name: 'name', d[{...}] ,...}] }

tutorial.title: element
tutorial.content: Target get element to create the DataTree.

tutorial.title: data (Optional)
tutorial.content: Target get element to create the DataTree.

tutorial.title: warning (Optional)
tutorial.content: It's booleen data type (true or false) and default value is true. confirm message control parameter. If given value is true, when try to delete data confirm popup asking 'Are sure to delete'.

tutorial.title: DataTree Methods
tutorial.content:
DataTree.getData()

It's use to get data of DataTree and its retrun object. print to console log click here

DataTree.render()

It's use to reprint html element.
